title: What Do I Do After Sex? – Love & Sex Stuff
description:
Submit your questions here!:
http://www.kindafunny.com/loveandsex


So you do the deed...but then what?!?!?!

Each and every Monday at 9AM PST Tim Gettys and Nick Scarpino answer your questions about dating and relationship advice....cause that sounds like a good idea.


Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino



Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

transcript_chunks.text: Nick what do you do after sex more [Music] sex so Nick yeah today's question comes from 27-year-old Joanna Joanna says I've been married for the past 4 years and after many sexual escapades I'm wondering what the protocol is for after sex Behavior the movies make it look like smoking after sex is the way to go but that's neither safe nor appetizing we're both very light-hearted so often a joker a high five pops up not long after the fact how do those of you who don't have sex with the same person every time make that moment less awkward well I mean you know it's hard for me to remember that cuz I've been married for a while so every moment is exactly the same um all the time it's a tricky one wow well I mean if we're talking about a one night stand or a hookup or someone that you're just kind of casually having sex with um that's different than if you're obviously in a committed relationship but I just want everyone to remember one thing right now is silly granted it's a very very

kind of casually having sex with um that's different than if you're obviously in a committed relationship but I just want everyone to remember one thing right now is silly granted it's a very very important thing in life and it done incorrectly can be incredibly dangerous but at the same time um it's supposed to be fun right and it's supposed to be enjoyable and so don't put too much pressure on yourself to figure out kind of what your exit strategy is um just do what I used to do just throw something and when they look the other way run out the door don't say thank you never say thank you that's weird can you just can you do this can you just hold the hand up like this yeah and go respect I mean yeah you could do that cuz that's funny and weird but don't like legitimately thank them for something that makes everything you might think it sounds like a good idea it's not it's really really weird the other thing I love you we said this before your first time having sex do not say I love

that makes everything you might think it sounds like a good idea it's not it's really really weird the other thing I love you we said this before your first time having sex do not say I love you anywhere else maybe if you're in a committed relationship you're allowed to say that whenever the hell you want now I think an easy thing that most people generally would want to go for is little cuddling now cuddling has a time in place and sleep has a time to place as far as I'm concerned when you're in a bed with someone three things are going down there's sex time there's cuddle time and there's sleep time the order that those are in changes up every time you figure it out where does snuggle time come in snuggle times cuddle time okay what's the difference between snuggle and cuddle I feel like there is a huge difference between the snuggle and the cuddle The Snuggle I think is preex and chill snuggle up to someone and then you you start making out I think that it's a safe bet to go for

there is a huge difference between the snuggle and the cuddle The Snuggle I think is preex and chill snuggle up to someone and then you you start making out I think that it's a safe bet to go for the cuddle and feel that out and be very very perceptive to how they take that because I'm going to say that there it's an overwhelming majority of people want the cuddle and then it's you just kind of feel out how long that goes or whatever then give them their space and then you can go on with your life yeah see some most people do my wife doesn't want the cuddle afterward but you know that though I do know that and it took a while but she used to not communicate that to me what she would do is she would do the thing a dog does when it burls in between you and then wants more space it just spreads out all right she would just push me to the other side of the bed until I roll off and then she'd go to sleep classic love and sex it's about communication it's about honest y it's about trust

out all right she would just push me to the other side of the bed until I roll off and then she'd go to sleep classic love and sex it's about communication it's about honest y it's about trust keep coming back here every Monday 9:00 a.m. it's going to be a fun time go to c.com andex fill out your questions fill out your topics we'll talk about all of them it's going to be a good time we'll see you next week [Music]
